mapper.insert: insert into ykt_course (id, tag_id, name, subtitle, main_image, activity_price, price, create_time, update_time, status, is_alive, sub_images, detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAlive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subImages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
